item.title: Report E-2024080668
item.description:
Report E-2024080668

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-29T09:23:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-25
  • City: ROCHESTER
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: HEPACO was dispatched to the site. Upon the contractor’s arrival, personnel observed that the released material impacted the packaging and pallet and estimated that half-a-gallon of material was released due to the lid being loose on two (2) 55-gallon drums. HEPACO personnel tightened the lids, deployed absorbent pads, and then cleaned the released material. The absorbent pads and recovered material were placed into one (1) 5-gallon poly drum and was staged onsite at the terminal prior to the contractor demobilization
